content:
A gentle breeze, drinks outdoors...
Ah, I can see the anticipation on your face!
I'll leave it to you then! (smiles)

It might... attract some "unusual visitors."
Yeah, don't ask how I know that.
(smiles)

If I put some glowing furniture on the grass,
maybe when new friends arrive in our world bubble,
they might...

When placing furniture in an open space,
be mindful of angles, positions, and combinations.
If you arrange them in strange linear patterns,

Look over there, there's an empty spot,
No wildgrass or trees growing around,
Don't you think it'd be perfect for a few small tables and chairs?

You can see the glowing ground from up in the air?!
(Lost in thought) Hmm... that's pretty unique when you think about it.
